  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/symbolconverter">SymbolConverter</a></>}>
Specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/recordvisitor">RecordVisitor</a> for collecting exported symbols and undefined symbols if RecordSlice being visited represents a flat-namespaced library. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/symbolconverter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
